skillTree.localised_description: Perhaps it is the Fly Lord's apparent nonchalance that enrages Tzeentch so? Whatever the reason, the Great Game's greatest player, and his greatest servant, have an adversary on which to focus their ire.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Nurglish factions
Ability: "Gaze of Fate"

skillTree.localised_description: With just a wave of the hand, projectiles fired at this servant of Tchar are turned from sharp and pointy to soft and entirely harmless.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%
Ability: "Hidden in Time"

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: Fateweaver may harness the Winds of Magic to his best advantage, for he already knows all the possible outcomes of his actions.

	(local province)
Miscast base chance: -40%

skillTree.localised_description: Though all who serve the Changer are gifted with additional protection from attack, some can restore it to maximum effectiveness faster than others.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

Barrier replenishment rate: +25%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kairos' scribes faithfully record every baleful whisper that passes his lips, that they be made real, in the form of the Daemonic Horrors that do his bidding.

skillTree.localised_description: Of all the gifts bestowed by the Dark Powers upon their followers, the boons of Tzeentch are surely the most desirable.

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Though they may appear ridiculous, the whirling, screeching footsoldiers of the Great Conspirator are the iron in his feathered martial glove.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +8% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +5% for Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +16% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Although it can be said that they have failed His tests, the broken minds and fluctuating, mutated bodies of Tzeeneth's lesser minions still have their uses.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Chaos Furies, Marauders of Tzeentch and Screamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Chaos Furies, Marauders of Tzeentch and Screamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Unburdened by mass, Tzeentch's flaming servants surge toward the foe – the heralds of their utter doom, no less.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +5% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The thundering of their Chaos Steeds and chariots announces the arrival of Kaldour's dread Knights, and death is never far behind them.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +8% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: For the Winged Watchers and Doomstriders of this world, their very lack of identifiable corporeal form shall be their armour against attack.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Lord of Change, Chaos Warshrine of Tzeentch and Soul Grinder of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)
Passive ability: "Seer of Destiny"

skillTree.localised_description: Even the bravest, most rational souls waver in the hideous, laughing face of their worst nightmares.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Marauders, Chaos Warshrines, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Of the many weapons available to Tchar, derangement must surely be the greatest and most satsifying to wield.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The flickering beings of flame are in many ways the purest servants of the Changer, for their gaseous forms are ever in a state of flux.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +24% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Flamers of Tzeentch, Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The best form of defence is attack, and the best form of attack is the one which reaches into the foe's mind and turns its contents against them.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch, Chaos Furies and Screamers of Tzeentch units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Master of Fates"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: Who pays the piper? Why, Fateweaver's opponents, of course, with their minds and souls as coins of currency.

effects.description:
Changing of the Ways cost: -3%
	(factionwide)

Changing of the Ways cost: -6%
	(factionwide)

Changing of the Ways cost: -9%
	(factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who cannot think clearly and lucidly are unable to resist the insidious creep of Ruin.

effects.description:
Control: +1
	(all provinces)

Control: +2
	(all provinces)

Control: +3
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: Surprise is half the battle. The other half is pure, unadulterated terror in the face of certain madness.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +20%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +30%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having effected Change upon one's enemies, what next for the Mocking Watcher? More of the same, naturally, for to do so over and over again brings the sweetest of raptures.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways cooldown: -1 turns
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -2 turns
Changing of the Ways cooldown: -3 turns

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.localised_description: The promise of Change, though it may amount to nothing more than the cruellest of tricks, ensures the forces of Tzeeneth are fed and nourished.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -3%
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -6%
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -9%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: When you know all there is to know, as does Kairos, nothing is beyond the reach of your grasp.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways cost: -100% for "Reveal Faction Intentions"

skillTree.localised_description: The many faces of the Wind-lord are described here, along with all the terrible mysteries of destiny. Between these lines lurks insanity, ever waiting to trap the unwary.

effects.description: Grimoires: 1 per turn
Grimoires: 2 per turn

Grimoires from all buildings: +50%
	(local province)
Grimoires: 3 per turn

Grimoires from all buildings: +100%
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Tzeentch knows that at their cores all beings desire Change, and as such there are no shortage of recruits willing to march under his many-coloured banner.

Casualty replenishment rate: +2%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

	(Lord's army)

factionEffects.localised_description: Kairos sits at Tzeentch's right hand, stirring the stygian depths of the Well as he whispers aloud the secrets that only he can see.

Hero action success chance: +15%
	(all characters)

items.colour_text: Kairos lives apart from the flow of time. Thus, he does not easily succumb to ill-fortune, for fate can easily be altered if one has the proper knowledge.
